remarks.para: May be inoperative provided it is not required by 14 CFR.

note.para: If ADS-B is installed in lieu of or as a replacement for 14 CFR required equipment, the repair category in the operator’s MEL will be the same as that of the 14 CFR equipment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "ADS-B INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
